title: 15 Illustrated UI Design Examples
short: Some awesome examples of Illustration in UI for your design inspiration!
body: In recent times, there has been a real surge in the use of illustration across the web. As many brands see the value in illustrated graphics as giving the impression of friendliness, modernity & humanity. We’ve collected 15 examples of UI designs featuring captivating illustrations. Enjoy! ## [Snapsound Homepage (In progress) by Mike Kus](https://dribbble.com/shots/7160309-Snapsound-Homepage-In-progress) ## [Urban Jungle - Landing Page by Outcrowd](https://dribbble.com/shots/10000204-Urban-Jungle-Landing-Page) ## [Nutracheck Website Redesign by Cuberto](https://dribbble.com/shots/10154541-Nutracheck-Website-Redesign) ## [Sleepiest Start Page Design by Cuberto](https://dribbble.com/shots/10234933-Sleepiest-Start-Page-Design) ## [ConsumerVoice Landing Page by Cuberto](https://dribbble.com/shots/8229052-ConsumerVoice-Landing-Page) ## [Foodoo Cooking Academy Website by Halo Web](https://dribbble.com/shots/10865257-Foodoo-Cooking-Academy-Website) ## [Calm App Design - Keep Calm by Bhavna Kashyap](https://dribbble.com/shots/11046369-Calm-App-Design-Keep-Calm) ## [Calm. - Landing Page by Outcrowd](https://dribbble.com/shots/9912279-Calm-Landing-Page) ## [Global Charity Giving Platform by Cuberto](https://dribbble.com/shots/11959942-Global-Charity-Giving-Platform) ## [FARM by Rwds](https://dribbble.com/shots/11948462-FARM) ## [Landing Page - Autumn Nature Reserve by Outcrowd](https://dribbble.com/shots/7151693-Landing-Page-Autumn-Nature-Reserve) ## [Landing - Lakes wealth Loch by Outcrowd](https://dribbble.com/shots/7775635-Landing-Lakes-wealth-Loch) ## [Web App - G&B by Outcrowd](https://dribbble.com/shots/10707100-Web-App-G-B) ## [Product Review and Feedback Platform by Cuberto](https://dribbble.com/shots/8084353-Product-Review-and-Feedback-Platform) ## [Freelance Blog Illustrated Concept by Alex Socoloff ✪](https://dribbble.com/shots/12048797-Freelance-Blog-Illustrated-Concept) ## Related Posts: * [18 Awesome 3D UI Design Examples](https://www.easeout.co/blog/2020-06-09-18-awesome-3d-ui-design-examples) * [25 Top Neumorphism UI Design Examples](https://www.easeout.co/blog/2020-03-27-25-top-neumorphism-ui-design-examples) * [15 Neumorphism UI Code Examples](https://www.easeout.co/blog/2020-04-09-15-neumorphism-ui-code-examples)
